snippet: In an out-of-court settlement, the commodity trader Trafigura will pay $1.7 million in fines for illegally exporting toxic waste to Ivory Coast, Dutch prosecutors said Friday.
abstract: Dutch prosecutors say commodity trader Trafigura will pay $1.7 million in fines for illegally exporting toxic waste to Ivory Coast.
lead_paragraph: In an out-of-court settlement, the commodity trader Trafigura will pay $1.7 million in fines for illegally exporting toxic waste to Ivory Coast, Dutch prosecutors said Friday.

headline.seo: Trafigura to Pay Fine for Exporting Toxic Waste
headline.main: Netherlands: Toxic Waste Case Is Settled
headline.print_headline: Netherlands: Toxic Waste Case Is Settled
